name: Jetpack Monsters
description:
Controls
  • aswd / ar row keys --- MOVE
  • c / numpad 0 --- FIRE
YOU CAN CHANGE THE KEYS Jetpack Monsters

Jetpack Monsters, a two-player, paper-themed game, hase different game options and arenas. When I saw that I had a lot of fun playing the prototype version of the project with my friends, I started developing it and the final version is here!

************************************************************************************

Coding: Rectewodwhey

Design: Skimmer

Level Design: Utku, Rectewodwhey

Music: https://big58.itch.io/8bit-ost-the-saga

Gameplay Video: Utku

************************************************************************************

"Jetpack Monsters", made in 1 week and hand-draw graphics, is live on itch.io for pc! Have fun! 

************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************

İki oyunculu, kağıt temalı bir oyun olan Jetpack Monsters, farklı oyun seçeneklerine ve arenalara sahip. Arkadaşlarımla birlikte projenin prototip versiyonunu oynarken çok eğlendiğimi görünce geliştirmeye başladım ve final versiyonu karşınızda!

************************************************************************************

1 haftada yapılan ve grafikleri elle çizilen "Jetpack Monsters" pc için itch.io'da yayında! İyi eğlenceler!
